content.question:
Which of the following questions is most relevant
 to understanding the Calvin cycle?

choices.label:
How is ATP used in the formation
 of 3-carbon carbohydrates?
How is NADP+ reduced to NADPH?
How is ATP produced in chemiosmosis?

content.answer:
How is ATP used in the formation
 of 3-carbon carbohydrates?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
